author: The Hindu
title: The race to find a cure for COVID-19
description: While efforts to develop an anti-COVID-19 vaccine are encouraging, safety issues are paramount
content: The novel coronavirus has infected more than 4,00,000, people worldwide and led to the deaths of more than 17,000. The epicentre of the pandemic has shifted from Wuhan district in China to the highly developed Western world. Countries such as Italy, Spain, Fr… [+6634 chars]
